name: Wrapped Ether (Portal)
reason: The dominant Layer 1 asset bridged to Solana via Wormhole. Extremely low insider control on the underlying asset (Ethereum), but carries inherent bridge smart contract risks.

name: Wrapped BNB (Portal)
reason: Bridged version of the Binance ecosystem token. High utility and liquidity, but the underlying asset has significant centralized influence from the issuing exchange.

name: Wrapped Matic (Portal)
reason: Polygon's native token bridged to Solana. Moderate insider score reflecting the Polygon Foundation's treasury and allocation, representing cross-chain liquidity.

name: Wrapped AVAX (Portal)
reason: Avalanche consensus token bridged via Portal. serves as a speculative instrument and liquidity pairs on Solana DEXs. Moderate centralization profile.

name: Wrapped Chainlink (Portal)
reason: The standard for decentralized oracle networks. Bridged version allows for price speculation on Solana. The underlying asset has a strong reputation and moderate distribution.

name: Wrapped Uniswap (Portal)
reason: Governance token for the largest Ethereum DEX. While the bridged token doesn't govern on Solana, it represents a 'blue-chip' DeFi asset with deep liquidity.

name: Wrapped Lido DAO (Portal)
reason: Governance token for the dominant liquid staking provider on Ethereum. Higher insider score due to the concentration of voting power in the DAO's early investors.

name: Wrapped Curve DAO (Portal)
reason: Curve Finance governance token. Bridged exposure allows for speculation on Curve's wars and emissions. Higher insider control due to founder's significant stake.

name: Wrapped NEAR (Portal)
reason: Native token of the NEAR Protocol bridged to Solana. Represents a competing L1 ecosystem asset. Moderate insider allocation to foundation and backers.
